stopifnot(file.exists(activityMonitoringData_zipFileName))
unzip(activityMonitoringData_zipFileName)
activityMonitoringData_fileName <- "activity.csv"
stepdf = read.csv(activityMonitoringData_fileName)
str(stepdf)
